conclusion: To determine which blocks the vehicle (A) will collide with and its final stop position, we can observe the sequence of events in the images provided.
The vehicle (A) is moving toward the blocks from the right side of the frame.
The first object in the vehicle's path is the red block.
The vehicle collides with the red block, causing the block to move.
The vehicle continues moving forward after the collision with the red block.
After colliding with the red block, the vehicle moves toward the purple block.
The vehicle collides with the purple block, causing it to shift slightly.
After colliding with the purple block, the vehicle stops near the colorful ball.
The vehicle (A) collides with the red block first, then collides with the purple block, and finally stops near the colorful ball after these collisions.
